summary: Lycan\'arie Race part of a collection on steam
descriptionHtml:
**VERSION 1.1 TONED DOWN VERSION ONLY 5 ON ATTRIBUTES**
**VERSION 1 FULL 10 ON ATTRIBUTES**
This is my first mod it\'s my own race meant for the combat role as this race dosn\'t regenerate magicka has a toned down version of Histskin, Redguard stamina and the Ork berserk abilities and of course Werewolf abilities. please post any feed back thanks. 

\"Hailing from a small spit of land off Morrowind. Not a lot is known of the Lycan\'arie except that 
they are a very hardy and aggressive race of Humans known to sell their sword arm. They don\'t 
regenerate Magicka. Though this is a weakness they know how to make up for it in close combat, 
they have been known to go in to a berserk blood rage and in battle they seem to recover their 
health and stamina.... It\'s as if their animals....\" Legate Antos Cypus 3E 433 First Seed
Known compatible mod\'s:-

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25392/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22134/? both really popular and good mods

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2907//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26874//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27430/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D27430%26user%3D1&pUp=1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11459/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13779//?

and for the companions the obvious mods: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34147/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26344/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486//?
and this http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35228//?
author: Minesawhiskey
